item.title: Gallup: Trump's return pushes economic optimism to seven-year high
item.description: President Trump's return to the White House has pushed American optimism about the economy to a seven-year high in Gallup polling, released Monday.

item.title: Interior Secretary Doug Burgum promotes Trump's tariffs

item.title: Sen. Chuck Grassley seeks fertilizer exemption from tariffs, sparking backlash
item.description: President Trump's tariffs on Mexico and Canada will go into effect on Tuesday. Some GOP allies are already looking for a carveout.
